messages.subject: Japan and Her People NOW AVAILABLE
messages.msgSnippet: At long last, Japan and Her People is now available.  You can find it here: http://www.amazon.com/Japan-Her-People-Anna-Hartshorne/dp/097903972X/ This is
messages.messageBody:
At long last, "Japan and Her People" is now available. You can find
it here:

http://www.amazon.com/Japan-Her-People-Anna-Hartshorne/dp/097903972X/

This is what I've been working on for the last 5 months or so.

Thanks to everyone who helped out - I think the printer put it up
before we had an "acknowledgements" section, so Nagaeyari might want
to hold off for a couple weeks before buying it :P

So, anyway, help support the samurai archives and the future Journal
by picking up a copy. It should be worth your time. You can either
pick it up online at amazon.com, barnesandnoble.com, or you can order
it at a barnes and noble store - just be sure you are picking up the
correct book, there seem to be a few out there with the same title.
